Translations.Text: Li romp them into pec escept por grand unu ili refer gxi
Ili dir Whoever did this our di est really transgressor
Ili dir Ni auxd youth minac them; li est vok Abraham
Ili dir Bring him okul all popol ili bor witness
Ili dir vi do this our di O Abraham
Li dir est grand unu did gxi. Ir pet them se ili parol
Ili sorb aback dir al Ja vi est des unu transgressing
Ili reverted their old ide Vi kon plen put ke these ne parol
Li dir vi tiam worship DI Do ki ne posed potenc benefit vi harm vi
Vi incurred fi worshipping idols DI! Vi ne kompren
Ili dir Brul him support your di this est ki vi decid do
Ni dir O fajr est cool sekur por Abraham
Tiel ili schemed him ni far them losers
Ni sav him ni sav Lot land ni ben all popol
Ni granted him Isaac Jacob gift ni far them ambaux righteous
